EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App - 2015.06.09.Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Join our Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Don’t forget to register for our upcoming webinar, Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App! In the webinar, guest Forrester Research Analyst Michael Facemire and Tricentis Founder and Chief Product Officer​, Wolfgang Platz, will discuss how to ensure the quality of modern mobile apps and contain the end-to-end explosion of back-end data sources that ultimately deliver the ideal mobile app experience.
Our “Managing the Chaos: Quality and the Modern Mobile App” webinar will take place on June 9th, 2015, starting at 4:00 pm CEST. We look forward to seeing you at our webinar!
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/managing-the-chaos-quality-and-the-modern-mobile-app-2015-06-09?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/managing-the-chaos-quality-and-the-modern-mobile-app-2015-06-09?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db> Tue, Jun 9, 2015 4:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. CEST 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. EDT
Michael Facemire Principal Analyst Forrester
Wolfgang Platz Founder and Chief Product Officer​ Tricentis
